oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brown Family (5/5) - Record
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bureau of Refugees, Freedmen and Abandoned Lands;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Received at Memphis, Tenn., this 8th day of May 1869, of Fred S. Palmer, Disbursing Officer of Claims of the Bureau Refugees, Freedmen and Abandoned Lands, the sum of One Hundred Thirty Three Dollars and Eighty Three cents, being the amount -- Pay and Bounty due on from the Government of the United States, as for U.S. Treasury Certificate No. 5054519"
